cab.content: This Document is the Property ofHis Britannic M:majesty's GovernmentJWtilitary Secret.919, 7 344JvT- ^9%^ From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, ilHALLlit^ ' 26th May 1919.(Received 26th.)'25th May. Please add following, omitted in error, to daily report 7093, Serial No. 13, 24th May:-" Lieuts. Barker and Hoare, R.A.F., been handed over by Zakka Khel, and reached Landi Kotal safely." Part 2. No important operations have been reported. On Mohmand y border our patrols have been sniped. Our planes bombed Afghans in this1 area and were fired on by small Afghan guns."n M77141
